text: Fhe Bakɨme mba bunin Ananaias ga suaŋgim, Ananaias thav vui. Ana vov, mba phena vhen vergap, mbaram won farven Sor tɨkhɨngiap, khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nan fek Sor, ndu mba tuavar ndaim, Guma Bakɨme Zisas ana ndun hɨgi, ana ntigem, na sarigim, gu zɨgi. Ndu rɨmani ntigem taagi ganɨrim, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar guigira ndu givarga.”
